text: fallen state troopers memorial certain disbursements authorized amend rsa iii to read as follows the commissioner of the department of administrative services or designee shall administer and disburse to the committee established in rsa the moneys in the special nonlapsing account established in rsa no money other than necessary expenses prior to construction shall be disbursed until the governor and council approve and award the contract for the construction of the memorial fallen state troopers memorial final design amend rsa vi b to read as follows b oversee the construction of the memorial the award of the contract final design for the construction of the memorial shall be subject to the approval of the governor and council
